org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRGL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRGL

  • public final class OVRGL
extends java.lang.Object
    Native bindings to libOVR, using the Oculus SDK C API.

    This class contains OpenGL specific functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL

        public static int ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL(long hmd,
                                int format,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                java.nio.ByteBuffer outTextureSet)
        Creates a Texture Set suitable for use with OpenGL.

        Multiple calls to ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL for the same ovrHmd is supported, but applications cannot rely on switching between ovrSwapTextureSets at runtime without a performance penalty.

        Parameters:
        hmd - an ovrHmd previously returned by Hmd_Create.
        format - the texture format
        width - the requested texture width
        height - the requested texture height
        outTextureSet - the created OVRSwapTextureSet, which will be valid only upon a successful return value. This texture set must be eventually destroyed via Hmd_DestroySwapTextureSet before destroying the HMD with Hmd_Destroy.
        Returns:
        an ovrResult indicating success or failure. In the case of failure, use _GetLastErrorInfo to get more information.

      • ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL

        public static int ovrHmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL(long hmd,
                                int format,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                PointerBuffer outTextureSet)
        Alternative version of: Hmd_CreateSwapTextureSetGL

      • ovrHmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL

        public static int ovrHmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL(long hmd,
                               int format,
                               int width,
                               int height,
                               java.nio.ByteBuffer outMirrorTexture)
        Creates a Mirror Texture which is auto-refreshed to mirror Rift contents produced by this application.

        A second call to ovrHmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL for a given ovrHmd before destroying the first one is not supported and will result in an error return.

        Parameters:
        hmd - an ovrHmd previously returned by Hmd_Create.
        format - the texture format
        width - the requested texture width
        height - the requested texture height
        outMirrorTexture - the created ovrSwapTexture, which will be valid upon a successful return value. This texture must be eventually destroyed via Hmd_DestroyMirrorTexture before destroying the HMD with Hmd_Destroy.
        Returns:
        an ovrResult indicating success or failure. In the case of failure, use _GetLastErrorInfo to get more information.

      • ovrHmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL

        public static int ovrHmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL(long hmd,
                               int format,
                               int width,
                               int height,
                               PointerBuffer outMirrorTexture)
        Alternative version of: Hmd_CreateMirrorTextureGL
